relevant_findings.general: Very pleasant, well-appearing female who is clutching her abdomen in pain.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm with no murmurs appreciated.
relevant_findings.heent: Conjunctivae mildly pale. No oral lesions. MM dry.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Mild distension, normal active bowel sounds. +TTP in LLQ and LUQ. No rebound and no guarding. No masses appreciated.
relevant_findings.rectal: The patient has a large external hemorrhoid, which is nonbleeding. No stool in the vault, guaiac positive.
